 */export var ADD_PRODUCT_TO_CART='ADD_PRODUCT_TO_CART';export var REMOVE_PRODUCT_FROM_CART='REMOVE_PRODUCT_FROM_CART';export var UPDATE_TOTALS='UPDATE_TOTALS';export var APPLY_COUPON_TO_CART='APPLY_COUPON_TO_CART';export var REMOVE_COUPON_FROM_CART='REMOVE_COUPON_FROM_CART';export var UPDATE_SHIPPING_PRICE='UPDATE_SHIPPING_PRICE';/**
 * Update product list with new list (rewrite if already exists).
 * @param  {Array<Object>} items List of products returned from fetch
 * @param  {Number} totalItems Total number of products in this filter
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/Cart/Action/addProductToCart
 */export var addProductToCart=middleware(function(newProduct){return{type:ADD_PRODUCT_TO_CART,newProduct:newProduct};},"Store/Cart/Action/addProductToCart\n");/**
 * Remove specified product from cart
 * @param  {Object} product Product which should be removed
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/Cart/Action/removeProductFromCart
 */export var removeProductFromCart=middleware(function(product){return{type:REMOVE_PRODUCT_FROM_CART,product:product};},"Store/Cart/Action/removeProductFromCart\n");/**
 * Update totals block
 * @param  {Object} totals Object of calculated totals
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/Cart/Action/updateTotals
 */export var updateTotals=middleware(function(cartData){return{type:UPDATE_TOTALS,cartData:cartData};},"Store/Cart/Action/updateTotals\n");/**
 * Update shipment price in totals block
 * @param {Object} data
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/Cart/Action/updateShippingPrice
 */export var updateShippingPrice=middleware(function(data){return{type:UPDATE_SHIPPING_PRICE,data:data};},"Store/Cart/Action/updateShippingPrice\n");/**
 * Apply coupon to cart
 * @param  {String} string Coupon code
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/Cart/Action/applyCouponToCart
 */export var applyCouponToCart=middleware(function(couponCode){return{type:APPLY_COUPON_TO_CART,couponCode:couponCode};},"Store/Cart/Action/applyCouponToCart\n");/**
 * Remove coupon from cart
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/Cart/Action/removeCouponFromCart
 */export var removeCouponFromCart=middleware(function(){return{type:REMOVE_COUPON_FROM_CART};},"Store/Cart/Action/removeCouponFromCart\n");
